group_1.textRight: ...Alright, let's do this!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:1121A01]URAAAAAAAH!

group_1.textCenter: ...Say, what the heck is going on?
Why'd Yuna and Juri do that...?

group_1.narration: We awoke in a strange space, watching Kureha and@Ooba on some sort of monitor.
It was terrible,@the way they swung their weapons at the dead–@the very image of a demon...@I couldn't fathom what they were trying to do.

group_1.textRight: We can't hear them talking, so their motives@are unclear...

group_1.textLeft: I could understand if they'd done this in the past,@but it's not like them to suddenly lash out...
Yuna and Juri are real kind, see,@so there's gotta be a reason...!

group_1.textRight: If that is the case, perhaps they're being@manipulated...? Or something to that effect.
By the way, Urara, do you know any of those, er―@I think they're ghosts?

group_1.textLeft: I can't see their faces, so I dunno...
...But it sure seems like there are a bunch@of dead people.
To backtrack, what even is this space...?

group_1.textRight: About that...
When I activated my magic, I had the sensation of@my power getting stolen away...

group_1.textLeft: ...So basically, you used up all your juice, and...

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:1.2][chara:103301:cheek_0][chara:103301:lipSynch_1]We all died?

group_1.textLeft: There's definitely ghosts, so... Is this the afterlife?!

group_1.textRight: ...I've always been a little curious if such a@thing existed, but...
If I were to come up with the worst-case scenario...
I'd say...my Soul Gem has blackened, and this is@my Witch's Labyrinth.

group_1.narration: "It's true that your magic@has been taken away, but you're not dead.@You haven't turned into Witches, either."

group_1.textRight: Oh, um... I'm an acquaintance of Juri and@her friend, or something.
Mm... I guess you could call me your guide?

group_1.textLeft: ...Why did you phrase that as a question?

group_1.textRight: S-sorry...
I can tell you about this place, though.
Alright! Let me think, uh...@Where to start...
Miu...ra, this is a space made using your magic...
Ah, ehehe...um...

At the moment, Aleksha Kurusu...[chara:800200:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800200:cheek_1][chara:800200:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:800200:lipSynch_1] Kurusu is@purifying your Soul Gems from outside.

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you reading off of a script?
I suppose "Alexandra" could be hard to pronounce@if you've never said it before.

group_1.textRight: Urgh... I swear I'm not up to anything shady...

group_1.textLeft: Well... Suspicious or not, you're the only person@we can rely on right now.
